name: Nestopia Save State
summary: Learn about .NS1 files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

content: Nestopia provides 9 quick save slots that use the ".ns1" to ".ns9" extensions for saving states of a game. The save state will have the same name as the .NES ROM file it is created from. If the NES file is named game.nes then the NS1 file is named game.ns1.

description: Save state created and used by Nestopia, a Nintendo Entertainment System (NES) emulator; stores a saved game state that allows you to resume your game from the save point point at a later time.
